<script type="text/javascript">
<!--
	$(".forumjump").change(function() {
		var option = $(".forumjump").get(0).selectedIndex.value;

		if(option < 0)
		{
			window.location=('forumdisplay.php?fid='+option)
			return
		}

		window.location=({$forum_link})
	})
//-->
</script>
